description_html:
Inspired by European lighting design, this floor lamp offers a bright accent for seating areas or hallways. Four clear glass cylinders are arranged on an x-shaped frame at the top. The ribbed glass along with the decorative linear metal accents creates a distinctive profile. The top frame and thin column are all in a warm antique brass finish.

• 66" high x 11" wide.
• Shades are 10 1/2" high x 3 1/2" wide.
• Takes four 25 watt E26 base bulbs (not included).
• Warm antique brass finish; metal construction.
• On-off foot switch.
• 8-foot clear and silver cord.
product_name: Blake Antique Brass Metal Floor Lamp by Possini Euro Design
